docs.title: SalsaNOW
docs.text:
Turn your GeForce NOW session experiences into local ones with SalsaNOW ! Play from your favourite unsupported games to using professional software.

Before After

SalsaNOW is meant to be easy to use and install, it only takes a few minutes to get it set up and running !

docs.title: Can i get banned for using SalsaNOW ?
docs.text:
There are no records of people getting banned using any GeForce NOW Method. You do use SalsaNOW at your own risk though !!!

SalsaNOW is an independent project and is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to NVIDIA or GeForce NOW in any way.

docs.title: FAQ
docs.text:
SALSANOW DOES NOT WORK ON FREE TIER AND ALLIANCES

1. Can i play games with kernel anticheat on SalsaNOW ? (Easy Anti-Cheat, Battleye etc)

No, because your GeForce NOW session will always be at user level, meaning you are not gonna be able to do administrator tasks.

2. Why do i get access is denied ?

This is because your GeForce NOW session is only at user level, administrator tasks are not possible.

3. My games do not save, why does this happen ?

THIS ONLY APPLIES FOR PERSISTENT STORAGE USERS, NOTHING SAVES WITHOUTH PERSISTENT STORAGE

This is because not all games save in the whitelisted folder path locations where GeForce NOW persists to, workarounds are needed to be done. (making a batch file that creates folders, does junctions)

Folder Paths that do persist:

"C:\Users\kiosk\Documents" "C:\Users\kiosk\AppData" I:\ (The whole drive persists)

5. Can i use GeForce NOW for more than just games using SalsaNOW ?

Yes, since you have the ability of running and installing unathorized software you can run and use anything on GeForce NOW as long as it does not require administrator rights or blacklisted. - Software that does require administrative rights at install can be installed on a local host machine and then archived, downloaded and extracted on GeForce NOW ready to use, meaning making the software portable

6. My dualshock/dualsense special features (haptic feedback, touchpad and such) do not work with SalsaNOW, why does this happen ?

Clarification on this can be found here: NVIDIA SUPPORT

7. Why do i get an error message when i try extracting big in size archives with 7zip (0x8004000B)

This is because everything at 7zip extraction process gets stored inside the TEMP folder temporary files, which fills up the storage of the C:/ drive, the C:/ drive and the other drives except the I:/ drive only have around 60GB, in order to solve this you can access the following reddit comment link: Reddit Link Post

8. I can't see any Install-to-Play games on GeForce NOW, why is that ?

Alliances do not have Install-to-Play yet, which means the method cannot be done in any shape or form. (This means you cannot do any method) Alliances list that do not have Install-to-Play and are unsupported with any GeForce NOW methods: (GFN.CO.KR, AU, Taiwan Mobile, GAME+, Cloud.GG, Zain, ABYA, StarHub, Yes, GFN.AM, rain, Digevo)

More information can also be found at: I2P Compatibility Guide GeForce NOW Install-to-Play Overview

Nvidia GeForce NOW Persistent Storage purchase page: Upgrade Storage

For getting the most out of SalsaNOW you can find out all it's available features on Features page.

docs.title: .NET Install Support
docs.text:
Microsoft .NET

SalsaNOW supports a special way of installing .NET 5.0 up to 10 via a special executable that installs the versions at path C:\Users\kiosk\AppData\Local\Microsoft\dotnet

In order to run the .NET special installer you must run the following command inside CMD: "I:\Apps\SalsaNOW\SilentApps\InstallNet.exe"

docs.title: Epic Games Launcher
docs.text:
Epic Games On GeForce NOW

If you wish to install the Epic Games Launcher you can simply start the Epic Games shortcut from desktop and wait for it to do it's initial setup !

Cloud saves are supported !

Games can be installed like in the gif below You can click/tap on images to zoom on them

Usage: EpicGamesInstallerGFN.exe [--updateEpic] [help|-h|--help]

USING [--updateEpic] WILL REMOVE EPIC GAMES METADATA, MEANING GAMES WILL NOT APPEAR IN YOUR LIBRARY AS INSTALLED AFTER UPDATE. MAKE SURE YOU MAKE BACKUP OF YOUR METADATA, GAMES REMAIN INSTALLED ON YOUR SESSION IF YOU HAVE PERSISTENT STORAGE.

docs.title: Game Manager (Cloud save management app)
docs.text:
Game Manager

Owned And Developed By Mercury

GameManager is a cloud save management application focused on automatically backing up your game save data to the cloud.

GameManager is linked to your Steam account (and GeForce NOW account). Whenever Steam is running under the same account you use to play your Steam or external games, and GameManager is open, any supported game detected at startup will be automatically picked up and monitored. When you exit the game, your save data is automatically uploaded to the cloud.

docs.title: NVIDIA Raytracing
docs.text:
(Persistent storage is required) If you wish to enable RTX (Raytracing) on your Install-to-Play session you can simply edit the INI file from I:\Apps\SalsaNOW\SalsaNOWConfig.ini and modify the value from NvidiaRaytracing = "0" to "1" or add the setting with the value you want if it doesn't exist, save the changes and then you can start a new session and enjoy !

If you want to disable RTX you can simply set the value to 0.

You can click/tap on images to zoom on them

docs.title: Seelen UI Opt Out
docs.text:
(Persistent storage is required) If you wish to opt out from Seleen UI maybe you don't like it's taskbar you can simply edit the INI file from I:\Apps\SalsaNOW\SalsaNOWConfig.ini and modify the value from SkipSeelenUiExecution = "0" to "1" !

You can click/tap on images to zoom on them

docs.title: Shortcuts Saving
docs.text:
Windows Shortcut Arrow

(Works only if you have persistent storage)

Desktop shortcuts (.lnk) now save with SalsaNOW ! Whenever a new shortcut gets added or removed everything gets synced in real time, no need to store them in some folder inside the I:/ drive (Removed or Renamed shortcuts go inside I:\Apps\SalsaNOW\Backup Shortcuts) !

SHORTCUTS SAVE BY DEFAULT FROM DESKTOP, THERE IS NOTHING TO ENABLE OR TRANSFER !

docs.title: Windows Startup (Batch Script)
docs.text:
Batch Icon

The batch file can be created and modified to your likings at I:\Apps\SalsaNOW\StartupBatch.bat, whenever SalsaNOW reaches the batch startup part it starts the batch from I:\Apps\SalsaNOW\StartupBatch.bat if one exists, this can be used as windows startup to start anything you want whenever you start a GeForce NOW Session with SalsaNOW.

docs.title: Wallpaper Changer
docs.text:
Wallpaper Change Window

Right clicking on desktop reveals a special button in which you can press to change your desktop wallpaper, that one being "Change Wallpaper (USE THIS)", clicking it will reveal a special window in the middle, drag and drop a .jpg file inside it to change your wallpaper !

docs.title: Bing Wallpaper Of The Day
docs.text:
Bing Wallpaper Of The Day

Leveraging bing photo of the day API we can now pull photos/images of the day from bing and apply them as wallpaper on WinXShell, photos reset everyday at 6:00 PM GMT+11 Canberra Australia. In order to apply the feature you must modify the config file at I:\Apps\SalsaNOW\SalsaNOWConfig.ini and modify the value from BingPhotoOfTheDayWallpaper = "0" to "1", if config line BingPhotoOfTheDayWallpaper = "0" does not exist, you must add it manually anywhere in the file !
